thread.title: La Liga: We're ready for Atletico Madrid says Cristiano Ronaldo

author: newsr.in
title: La Liga: We're ready for Atletico Madrid says Cristiano Ronaldo
text:
*Madrid:* Real Madrid striker Cristiano Ronaldo will have an extra spring in his step when he takes on Atletico Madrid at the Vicente Calderon stadium on Sunday.
*Cristiano Ronaldo. Pic/AFP*
The Portuguese became his club's all-time top scorer on Wednesday when he netted twice at Malmo in his team's 2-0 win in the Champions ... Â»
